sentences.sContent: Our primary concern is to provide the refugees with food and health care.
sentences.sCn: 我们的头等大事是向难民提供食品和医疗。

sentences.sContent: Many of the villagers rely on fishing as their primary source of income.
sentences.sCn: 很多村民以打鱼作为他们的主要收入来源。

sentences.sContent: Personal safety is of primary importance .
...Fossil fuels remain the major source of primary energy consumption in today's world...
...the United Arab Emirates has endorsed an ambitious target to draw 24% of its primary energy consumption from renewable sources by 2021...
...Renewables account for only a small share of global primary energy consumption...
...Irrigation is the primary agricultural use of human waste in the developing world...
...it's easy to lose sight of their primary mission: to produce and spread knowledge...
...the more they will use these categories as the primary basis for understanding themselves and others...
...some factors play a primary role in it...
...they have questioned whether the primary responsibility for digitally archiving the world's books should be allowed to fall to a commercial company...
...How did we let primary care slip so far...
...Remove the pressure for primary care physicians to squeeze in more patients per hour...

synos.tran: 主要的；[数]初级的；基本的

remMethod.val: prim(第一， 主要的) ＋ ary(具有…的) → 主要的
